name: Women's Hope
description: Women's HOPE, a program of Walden House, provides a residential treatment program for women and women with children. The program offers the following services: - Substance use treatment - Substance use and trauma-related counseling - Parenting education, health and wellness, employment, sober living skills, and family reunification - Access to transitional housing - Languages: English Eligibility: - Pregnant women - Women who have recently given birth - Women with children in their care - Women
